As mentioned in our previous offer, finally we have our Storage nodes in SG live! 

**Node specs:**

- Dual Xeon Silver 4216
- DDR4 ECC @ 2933 MHz
- 10Gbps Port
- Enterprise SATA drives in Hardware RAID-10

There are limited stocks available, so first come, first served. We have also restocked 3 NVMe plans in case you missed that last time.

______________________________________________________________________________________

    - IPv4: 1
    - IPv6: /112
    - Network: 10Gbps
    - 1TB Bandwidth
    - Linux OS
    - SolusVM Control Panel
    - Locations: Singapore DC2
